channel.title: Comments for page "Billy Style: Earth Wind and Fire"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Billy Style: Earth Wind and Fire"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
If I had to take a guess, it's referring to Naruto's ability to add Wind to his Rasengan.

"Can of Whoopass" is essentially the Rasengan in BvS, which is +2 Levels, and +2 Range. With this jutsu it's basically a more powerful version of the CoW, being +3 Range, and +3 Strength, along with costing more Chakra. I do know that in Naruto, that Wind enhances the properties of Fire, and outside of the reference to the band I don't see an exact link to Earth.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
I believe that the name of the Jutsu is a reference - Earth, Wind, and Fire is a band, if I remember correctly.
